recipe.title: Italian Sausage with Red Grapes
ingredients: 2 lb sweet Italian sausage (about 12 3- to 4-inch links)
instructions: Heat olive oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot but not smoking, then cook sausages, turning over once, until well browned, about 8 minutes total. Add grapes and cook, stirring occasionally, until sausages are cooked through and grapes are softened, 10 to 12 minutes. Stir in vinegar and salt and pepper to taste.
